snippet.title: Shoot & Destroy X - Trailer 2021
snippet.description:
Shoot & Destroy X is an extended edition celebrating this 1-bit shoot'em up's 10th anniversary. 

An outer space menace is at large destroying and conquering the galaxy. It's up to you, the lone aircraft pilot, to fly up there and put an end to it.

4 Levels, 3 Power-Ups, 3 Bosses - 20 minutes each playthrough. 
Includes a save system to save your score and 3 hidden achievements.

Available for Windows and Android (controller supported devices) at Itch.io:
https://samuelsousa.itch.io/

With Music by Shawn Andrew: 
@shawnandrewusic 

#Retro #Shooter #IndieGame
